templates.name: What are deep cuts?
templates.content: Deep cuts on grillz are a type of design that involves cutting deeper grooves into the grillz for a more pronounced, unique look. It makes the piece look more realistic due to the depth lines between the caps. It's a stylistic choice that adds texture and depth to the grillz, making them stand out more.

templates.name: Do single tooth fit well?
templates.content: Single/double cap grillz are still custom fitted to your teeth but it's a hit or miss style. It means that due to the minimum number of teeth that the grillz attaches to, it is possible to have some fitment issues. However, a big help/remedy would be to use a dental adhesive like Polident.

templates.name: Do your Grillz tarnish?
templates.content: With proper care, you won't have any problem with any tarnishing or discoloration. You should avoid eating, drinking, and smoking while wearing the Grillz.

templates.name: Do you make grillz for kids?
templates.content: We do not recommend that minors get custom fitter grillz as they'll outgrow them eventually but if you consent as a parent, we'd be happy to accommodate you.

templates.name: Who is this?
templates.content: This is Jordan, I'm part of the customer service team for Custom Gold Grillz. Let me know if there is anything I can assist you with today!

templates.name: Do you offer Apple Pay?
templates.content: We do support Apply Pay but it is currently unavailable as part of our payment options. we do accept major credit cards, Klarna, Affirm, and Shop Pay as financing options. We also accept CashApp and Venmo. For these, please reach out to our team at support@customgoldgrillz.com or call us at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST.

templates.name: Is this a good mold? (customer sends a picture of their mold)
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What are Custom Fitted Grillz?
templates.content: Our Custom Fitted Grillz are crafted from high-quality materials such as solid .925 sterling silver, 10K gold, 14K gold, or 18K gold. These grillz are tailored to each individual's teeth through the use of a molding kit. Being custom-made, there is a range of materials to choose from, including solid yellow gold, white gold, rose gold, and .925 sterling silver. These grillz can also be adorned with diamonds or made with unique designs for a truly personalized look.

templates.name: How much does shipping cost?
templates.content:
Our standard shipping prices are as follows:

USPS First Class - 3-5 days: $3.99
USPS Priority - 2-3 days: $8.99
USPS Express - 1-2 days: $39.99

We offer free standard shipping on domestic orders over $400!

templates.name: Can I adjust it to my size?
templates.content: Yes, it can be adjusted but it will still depend on the shape of your mouth and teeth. Premade grillz are one size and we cannot entirely guarantee fitment even if it can be adjusted.

templates.name: Why did I receive 2/two molds?
templates.content: One of the molds is extra in case the first one does not turn out good.

templates.name: Are they fake? What are the custom grillz made of?
templates.content: Our custom grillz, are made from solid gold or solid silver, and we also offer real diamond grillz.

templates.name: Which stone is the cheapest?
templates.content: The cheapest is CZs!

templates.name: Which ones will pass the diamond tester?
templates.content: Only real diamonds and Moissanites will pass the diamond tester and not CZs. Please note that Moissanites are not real diamonds but will pass the diamond tester!

templates.name: How do I mold them?
templates.content: You can check out the steps on how to mold them here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/how-they-work#Premade%20Grillz:~:text=HOW%20DO%20YOU%20MOLD%20THEM%3F or you can watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yqPneUKNWOg

templates.name: How many molding kits does it come with?
templates.content: There will be 2 sets of molding kits for all custom grillz orders.

templates.name: Why am I not approved for financing?
templates.content:
Sorry about that! We do not have control over the approval process so we are unable to determine why you were not approved. Please contact Affirm or Klarna directly to find out why you were not approved. Customers who are attempting to sign up for a loan are recommended to use their own information. Affirm and Klarna may use the information provided to verify your identity and in order to process your card for loan payments.

If it helps, we also offer Layaway as a payment option. You can read more about it here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/layaway-policy

templates.name: Do you offer international shipping?
templates.content: If you're an international customer, shipping times depend on your location and it may take 1-2 months depending on customs. May I know which country you'd like to get it shipped to so I can double-check on my end?

templates.name: Shipping too expensive
templates.content: Our shipping fee composes of 3 labels: shipping of molding kits, shipping molds back to us, and shipping the finished product to the customer. We also offer free shipping on domestic orders over $400. Hope you'll decide to go for it, and let me know if anything comes up!

templates.name: Can you clean or polish an item?
templates.content: Yes, we can polish and clean anything as long as the item was bought from us, it also depends on the condition of the item.

templates.name: Are your grillz thin?
templates.content: The grillz are made based on industry standards so they're not too thin to be brittle but not too thick to cause them to bulge out of your mouth.

templates.name: Do you accept CashApp or Venmo?
templates.content: We do accept CashApp and Venmo via fund/bank transfer! Please reach out to us at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you price match?
templates.content: I'm afraid we do not price match at the moment.

templates.name: Which grillz do you recommend?/I'm looking for grillz (EDIT WHEN NEEDED)
templates.content:
Thanks for reaching out! Are you looking for Gold, Silver, or Iced-out Grillz? If you're looking to get Iced-Out, do you prefer real natural diamonds, CZs, or Moissanite for the stones? 

Can you also tell me the number of teeth you're interested in and any additional style preferences that you might have?

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Can I get grillz if I have an overbite?
templates.content: Yes. We can get you fitted with grillz as long as we have a good mold of the teeth, even with the overbite.

templates.name: What is diamond dusting?
templates.content: The diamond dust won't use real stones but will be a specialized cut that will add a glittery shine to the grill.

templates.name: Are the grillz real?
templates.content: All of our grillz are made from a base of either high-quality stainless steel or jeweler's brass and plated with genuine gold. Our exclusive premium line of solid style stainless steel grills feature 18k IP gold plating (ion plating) which uses cutting edge gold plating technology.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $400. Maybe you can add something else to reach the min?

templates.name: Can you do laser engraving?
templates.content: We do! Laser Engraving is $40 per tooth.

templates.name: Can I go to my dentist for the impression of my teeth?
templates.content: We offer a free molding kit with your custom made Grillz order so you can take the impression of your teeth at home and you don't have to go to the dentist, however, if you wish to go to a dentist for a professional impression, you can also do that.

templates.name: Price adjustments
templates.content: We offer a grace period of 1 week before or after the sale is over. The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Can you get a grill if you have a gap?
templates.content: Yes, you can get a grill even if you have a gap between your teeth. Depending on the size of the gap, there are different options available such as making the teeth a bit larger, adding a filler, or making them as separate pieces.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/returns-and-refunds-policy

templates.name: What is the the difference between white gold plating vs sterling silver on perms?
templates.content: Gold plating will basically plate the base silver grill with white gold to make it look like the piece is made with 14k white gold but will eventually tarnish as the plating fades. Silver won't fade but cleaning them will restore them back to their original shine.

templates.name: Can I use an old mold?
templates.content: We can use the molds you have for the order as long as they're not too old. We don't accept stone molds that are more than 2 months old. This is because teeth can shift over time and we don't want to be responsible for any fitting issues that could arise from this, but we'll accept good stone molds from you, only if you're aware that we won't be held responsible for fitting issues due to your teeth shifting over time.

templates.name: Do you make partial dentures?
templates.content: We don't make partial dentures as we'll need teeth present to fit the grillz over.

templates.name: Do you do invisible settings?
templates.content: We actually do offer invisible setting as a custom order and pricing per tooth for 10k Invisible Set is $660 for Si quality and $780 for VS quality. As for the 14k Invisible Set, it's $780 for Si quality and $900 for VS quality.

templates.name: What does open face mean?
templates.content: It means only the borders or sides of your teeth will have materials and the center will be open.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/customgoldgrillz/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/customgoldgrills

templates.name: What if I have crooked/chipped/broken/gap between teeth?
templates.content: We've worked with customers who have crooked, missing teeth, and with gaps. As long as you have good impressions, then you're good to go. Do you mind sending us a photo of your mouth and teeth up-close at support@customgoldgrillz.com? Our jewelers will see what we can do for you.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: How much is the down payment?
templates.content: The down payment depends on what you're able to qualify for. If you qualify for the whole amount, then there's no down payment needed. If the financing firm you selected (Klarna or Affirm) can only finance a portion of the amount, then the remaining balance will be the down payment. You can check out this link for more information: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/financing?utm_campaign=concierge&utm_medium=text&utm_source=attentive&externalId=vPomi

templates.name: Reviews/ Testimonials
templates.content: Check out what some of our customers have to say about our products: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/testimonials

templates.name: I placed an order - I didn't receive an order confirmation email but I was charged
templates.content: I'm sorry to hear that! Have you made sure to check your spam and promo folders? If you didn't receive any email confirmation with the order number, that would mean the order didn't push through. And if there's a charge on your account, it'll just reverse. You can also reach out to your bank for assistance.

templates.name: I don't see Layaway as a payment option at checkout
templates.content: All Layaway payments are handled by our support team. Please reach out to us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to assist you with this!

templates.name: Will the VVS Moissanite stones pass the diamond tester?
templates.content: Yes, the VVS Moissanite will pass the normal diamond tester.

templates.name: Can you make grillz over retainers?
templates.content: Yes, we can work on fitting grillz over retainers, and here's how it works: https://www.instagram.com/p/CeO1KQtlbZ7/

templates.name: What is the difference between a back bar and front bar?
templates.content: The difference is mainly the placement as the front bar will have the back fully covered up with the tips of the 4 middle teeth covered at the front while the back bar will not have any presence in the front and will only be a thin strip at the back.

templates.name: What stones do you use?
templates.content: We use real diamonds, CZs, and Moissanites.

templates.name: I already sent in a mold but there was an issue with the payment. Can I resend the payment without doing a new mold?
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Yes, you can place another order. Just don't forget to leave a note about the mold you sent back to be used instead of the new molding kits.

templates.name: What comes with my premade grillz order? (the fitting bars are NOT molds)
templates.content: For premade grillz, your order will come with silicone fitting bars and instructions. A grillz storage box will be included with qualifying sets of premades when stated. We also offer additional silicone molding bars or grillz storage boxes for sale.

templates.name: Do you accept insurance?
templates.content: Really sorry! We do not accept insurance as a payment method. We have a buy now pay later program that you can avail of if you want; you can check out the details here: https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/sl/A0h8rIvP

templates.name: Do you offer permanent Grillz?/Can I install them permanently?
templates.content: For permanent Grillz, please email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com, and make sure to include the number of teeth you're interested in and the material (18k or 22k Gold). You can also give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: How do I take make the grillz last longer?
templates.content: In order to get the most out of your grillz, we recommend you don't eat, drink, or smoke with them in. This will help the grillz last longer because they're not exposed to harmful chemicals, fluids and heat that may damage them.

templates.name: How long do the grillz last?
templates.content: Our premium solid style premade grillz are made from a base of stainless steel and plated utilizing the ion plating process, so they'll last a long time. Our premium cluster grillz however, are made from a base of brass, but we also utilize the ion plating process for the same long lasting plating. The non premium premades are typically made using a base of jeweler's brass and a heavy gold plating. The gold plating usually lasts for years, but it's highly dependent on the frequency of usage and how it's cleaned and taken care of.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (415) 413-4915. Mon-Fri 9am-5pm PST or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: What is the difference betwee SI and VS diamonds?
templates.content: The difference is in the clarity. Our VS diamonds are shinier than our SI.

templates.name: What's the difference between Fully Bustdown Iced and Fully Iced?
templates.content: The main difference between the two is the number of stones per tooth. Fully Bustdown Iced will have more stones per tooth on average than the Fully Iced which translates to a better shine.

templates.name: Do you provide verification certificates for the VVS stones in your pieces?
templates.content: We don't provide certificates for our VVS diamonds, though you can have them tested when they arrive and I'm confident you'll be very pleased with the results!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at wholesale@customgoldgrillz.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Store Location / Do you have a physical store?
templates.content: We are located in San Francisco and we ship to all the states and a couple of international countries. At the moment we don't have a physical walk-in store and all our orders are completed online on our website. We're hoping to change this soon so definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: We are located in San Francisco but we do the whole process through mail. We ship to all the states and a couple of international countries. For our custom made Grillz, we'll mail you the free mold kits when you buy them so you can do your molds at home and mail your teeth impressions back for production. The production time right now is 2-3 weeks from the time we have good molds from you.

templates.name: Do you need straight teeth to get a grill?
templates.content: We can work with most people who have crooked teeth. The grillz are typically based on an impression of your teeth and will be made based off of that. If you'd like to have the teeth straightened, please let us know and we'll see if we can work with you.

templates.name: Can I use my grillz on top of dentures?
templates.content: Yes, you can wear the grillz on top of your dentures. However, please note that the Grillz may actually scratch them.

templates.name: Cancel/Edit
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you do dentures?
templates.content: Yes, we can do dentures, though the Grillz may actually scratch them. You will have to do the molds wearing the dentures.

templates.name: Do you offer financing?
templates.content:
We are partnered with Affirm, Klarna, and Shop Pay. Affirm offers equal monthly payments split into 3, 6, or 12 months. Klarna and Shop Pay, allow you to split your payment into 4 interest-free installments paid bi-weekly over 4 weeks. When you reach the checkout page, choose among the three as your payment provider and it will prompt you to prequalify, you will know right away how much you need to put down or the amount you need to pay per month. Once you're qualified, we will mail you the free mold kits so you can do your molds at home and mail your teeth impressions back for production. The finished piece will be sent to you once we're done so you can wear it while making payments. 

Lastly, If you're having issues with approval, we do have the layaway option available. You can check out how it works here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/pages/layaway-policy The gist of it is you can lock in the price of your piece and you just have to put in a 10% initial deposit. Best thing about this is no approval or assessments required and it is interest free. You have the flexibility on how much and when you can for the remaining amount (up to 365 days depending on the amount of your order). We'll start the process and send you the molding kits once you're able to pay off 75% of the total order.

templates.name: Can I still get grillz if I have a missing tooth/teeth? (most premade grillz won't be a good fit, ask the customer which one they're interested in)
templates.content: As long as the teeth on either side of the gap are healthy and strong enough to support the grill, we should be able to make you a grill. As each person's mouth is unique, please email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Mon-Fri 9am-5pm PST to see if we can work with your specific case.

templates.name: Can you make the grillz snap on to the roof of my mouth?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we can't make it snap on the top/roof of your mouth as we need to mold the grill towards your teeth to ensure the best fitting.

templates.name: What payment options do you offer?
templates.content:
We accept major credit cards and Klarna, Affirm, and Shop Pay as financing options. We also offer Layaway as a payment option and you can read more about it here: https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/sl/9Niuvldw

We do accept CashApp and Venmo as well and for these please reach out to our team at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST.

templates.name: Do I have to pay to send the mold back?
templates.content: No, you will receive a return label with the molding kits after you place a custom-fitted order. All shipping cost is included in the order so you don't have to pay for it anymore.

templates.name: How do I clean the grillz?
templates.content: It depends on whether you have the gold or sterling silver grillz. I would highly recommend reading our guide here: https://www.customgoldgrillz.com/blogs/news/cleaning-solid-gold-grillz

templates.name: What comes with my custom grillz order?/Will you send me the molds?
templates.content: For custom sets, your order will come with molding putty, dental trays, instructions, and a priority box with a prepaid return label attached to it. After the impressions are done, send them back to us using the included priority box and prepaid label.

templates.name: Layaway Program
templates.content:
With Layaway there is no need for a credit check, and you can arrange flexible payment schedules within a year. You only need to make an initial deposit of 20% to start the layaway. This program applies to orders over $1,000. For more details, here is the link:
https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/sl/UhVft1H9

templates.name: What should I put for Tooth Placement?
templates.content: I'd recommend checking out our Tooth Chart: https://www.grillzmontreal.com/cdn/shop/products/tooth_chart_9fbfe128-a1d2-4834-8b64-7a83856c743f_1200x1200.jpg?v=1596649216 while using it in front of the mirror.

templates.name: Product too expensive
templates.content:
Thanks for your feedback. I'll share future deals that may interest you! In the meantime, would you mind answering the questions below? I'll be happy to see if we can come up with a recommendation for you.

• What's your desired price range?
• Are you looking for Gold, Silver, or Iced-out Grillz? 
• If you're looking to get Iced-Out, do you prefer real natural diamonds, CZs, or Moissanite for the stones? 
• The number of teeth you're interested in?
• Any additional style preferences that you might have?

templates.name: The site won't accept my card.
templates.content: Make sure your billing information zip and the zip on your credit card match. Please make sure you're using one of our accepted payment methods, we accept major credit cards. I also suggest trying a different internet browser, as certain ones have issues with e-commerce stores. Is there an error message you're seeing on your end?

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS every business day at 2pm PST. For our custom-made grillz, the production time is 2-3 weeks for Solid Style Grillz and 3-4 weeks for Iced Out Grillz  not including the shipping of the molding kits (back and forth) and finished piece. Overall the timeframe could vary but should be around 3-4 weeks. For our pre-made grillz, once they're shipped it'll take 3-5 business days domestically.

templates.name: How do I measure my wrist for bracelets?
templates.content: You can use a tape measure. Hope this helps!

templates.name: Difference between CZ Stones (Cubic Zirconia) and Moissanites
templates.content:
You can check their differences below:

CZ Stones (Cubic Zirconia):
Made of cubic zirconium dioxide.
Less expensive than moissanites.
Good brilliance (sparkle) but less fire (color dispersion).
Relatively hard but can scratch more easily over time.

Moissanites:
Made of silicon carbide.
Slightly more expensive than CZ stones.
Excellent brilliance and fire, more colorful flashes of light.
Very hard, more resistant to scratching than CZ stones.
They pass the diamond tester.

templates.name: Can you alter/add teeth to an existing grill?
templates.content: I'm afraid we can't alter old/existing grillz.

templates.name: How do I activate my Gift Card?
templates.content:
The Gift Card has a random scratch-off 12-digit code on the back. Please contact us at support@customgoldgrillz or via social media with the following information:

- Provide us with your CGG order number
- Attach a video/link of the testimonial video
- Show that you've left us either a review either on Facebook or on Reseller Ratings ( https://www.resellerratings.com/store/survey/new/Customgoldgrillz_com/rating/5 )
- Give us the 12-digit code on your physical gift card

Hope this helps and please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with today!

templates.name: Broken Image
templates.content: Did you try to send a photo? I'm afraid it didn't come through on our end, can you please send it again? You can also send it over through e-mail at support@customgoldgrillz.com or to 415-413-4915.

templates.name: Do you have anything with real diamonds?
templates.content: We do offer real diamond jewelry and grillz. You can check out our collection at: https://customgoldgrillz.attn.tv/a1dFKy3tLjb7. We have different iced out designs on there that you can take a look at or if you have a very specific design in mind that's not on the website, send us a photo to 415-413-4915 and we can check it for you.

templates.name: How does the 20% CashBack work?
templates.content: CashBack is a way to reward you for shopping with us! You get to choose whether you want your CashBack as a gift card to Custom Gold Grillz or as a Visa prepaid card you can use anywhere.

templates.name: I'm interested in the Layaway plan, how do I get it?
templates.content: Our team will send you a custom invoice for our Layaway option. You can email our support team at support@customgoldgrillz.com or you can also call or text 415-413-4915 Mon-Fri 8AM-6PM PST so they can set up your order under Layaway.

templates.name: Do you have any gold options above 18K?
templates.content: We do offer 22K options but as a special request only, the best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!
